name: Spring Cleaning (magicaltoastfairy)
description:
Being cooped up in your room far too boring. You might well go out and explore the Underworld while you're here. But wait, why it is so messy? Maybe it wouldn't be so bad to make things brighter and spruce things up a bit? 

Controls: W A S D/ Arrows 

Bitsy Project for Game 231 - April 2021

This is my first Bitsy game so a lot of it is just me experimenting with the editor,  slapping together a bunch of concepts and attempting to make it cohesive. Much side missions galore. Enjoy. :) 

(Warning: contains themes revolving around graveyard stuff, potential copyright smiting, and inside jokes that makes no sense...)
